title: Strength Boost
description: A power-packed class focusing on building and toning muscle strength. Suitable for all fitness levels.

title: Cardio Blast
description: An energetic cardio class designed to improve cardiovascular endurance and burn calories. Get ready to sweat!

title: Dance Fusion
description: Groove to the beats and enhance your fitness through dance. Suitable for dance enthusiasts of all levels.

title: Yoga Harmony
description: Discover tranquility and balance through guided yoga sessions. Perfect for relaxation and holistic well-being.

title: Mindful Meditation
description: Nurture your mind and soul through guided meditation. A moment of calm in your busy day.
